author: Special Correspondent
text:
The City Armed Reserve Police personnel presented an impressive parade as of the closing ceremony of the annual mobilisation camp (refresher training) at the AR Ground here on Saturday.

Sumit Saran, Commissioner of Police, was the chief guest, and he inspected the guard of honour.

He also addressed the participants of the camp underlining the importance of maintaining discipline.

The refresher training programmes were aimed at upgrading the skills of police personnel, including women personnel, and keep them abreast on all fronts to continue functioning with ease in society. Various events were organised during the three week-long camp such as yoga demonstration and trekking to Yercaud to keep the police personnel fit and healthy.

Mr. Sumit Saran distributed prizes to the policemen on the occasion.
title: Impressive parade by Armed Reserve Police personnel
